p: Prior to the Ultra High Performance Liquid Chromatography tandem Mass Spectrometry (UHPLC–MS/MS) analysis, the samples were resuspended in 50 μl of 40% methanol and transferred to LC–MS vials. A six-point calibration curve was prepared from 0.025 to 4 ng/μl, including 2 ng/μl of [ 2H 6]-ABA in all calibration levels.
